targets.query:
import "math"

timeStart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timeStop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r._value) * -1.0)}))

import "math"

timeStart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timeStop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ( (r.inverter_ac_p * 1000.0) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p))) + (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * -1.0)) ) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])

import "math"

timeStart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timeStop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r._value))}))

rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])

timeStart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timeStop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "sun2000" and
    r._field == "inverter_ac_p"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

import "math"
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

timeStart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timeStop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
rangeSeconds = int(v: duration(v: timeStop - timeStart))
aggregation = duration(v: rangeSeconds / 6000)

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ((r.inverter_ac_p * 1000.0) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p))))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "solar"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "Consumo solar")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: aggregation, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ( (r.inverter_ac_p * 1000.0) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p))) + (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * -1.0)) ) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "total"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "Consumo total")

import "math"
import "date"
import "timezone"
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1d), stop: date.add(d: 1d, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1d)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.inverter_ac_p - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v: r.meter_p) * 0.001))}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h,
    fn: (tables=<-, column) =>
      tables
        |> integral(unit: 1h))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1h, from: r._time)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "solar"}))
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "solar")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1d), stop: date.add(d: 1d, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1d)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r.inverter_ac_p) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * 0.001)) + (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * -0.001))}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h,
    fn: (tables=<-, column) =>
      tables
        |> integral(unit: 1h))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1h, from: r._time)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "total"}))
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "total")

import "math"
import "date"
import "timezone"
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1w), stop: date.add(d: 1w, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1w)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ((r.inverter_ac_p) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * 0.001)))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "solar"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1d, from: r._time)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "Consumo Solar")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1w), stop: date.add(d: 1w, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1w)))  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.inverter_ac_p - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * 0.001)) + (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * -0.001))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "total"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1d, from: r._time)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "total")

import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1mo), stop: date.add(d: 1mo, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1mo)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r._value) * 0.001)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1d, from: r._time)}))

import "math"
import "date"
import "timezone"
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y), stop: date.add(d: 1y, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: ((r.inverter_ac_p) - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * 0.001)))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "solar"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1mo, from: r._time)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "Consumo Solar")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y), stop: date.add(d: 1y, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y)))  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "inverter_ac_p" or r._field == "meter_p")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.inverter_ac_p - (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * 0.001)) + (math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r.meter_p) * -0.001))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "total"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1mo, from: r._time)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["inverter_ac_p", "meter_p"])
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "total")

import "math"
import "date"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y), stop: date.add(d: 1y, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun2000")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "meter_p")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: math.mMax(x: 0.0, y: float(v:r._value) * -1.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(d: 1mo, from: r._time)}))

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Madrid")

  |> range(start: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y), stop: date.add(d: 1y, to: date.truncate(t: v.timeRangeStart, unit: 1y)))
